name: CUBE-Y
description:
CUBE-Y is a simple platformer, You play as a cube moving back and forth across the platform avoiding obstacles. This game is also the first that I will try to make into a bigger project. It is already on Unity Play. I hope you like it and will support me as I update and create games. The game files here might not be exactly the ones on Unity Play because I update that first. Huge Shout out to Brackeys who has made this possible. 

How to play: Left and Right arrow keys or the 'A' and 'D' keys.

Link to Unity Play:    https://play.unity.com/mg/other/cube-y-kc
